idea:
Our company M/S Bright Environmental Solutions Pvt. Ltd. was created under the guidance of its group directors, to achieve such Value from Waste.

Today we are successfully converting 10 tons of plastic waste into fuel oil, every day, using the chemical recycling process called “PYROLYISIS”.

We are manufacturing 6000 liters of Pyrolysis Oil (Fuel Oil), daily, which is supplied to nearby industries as an exact substitute for LDO (Light Diesel Oil) and is used by them for combustion in furnaces and boilers.

The company is successfully creating “ENERGY from WASTE” since the past 10 years and has a dream to establish this facility all across the country for the betterment of the environment and make a small contribution to a “SWACH BHARAT”.
name: BRIGHT ENVIRONMENTAL SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Vaamoz is created with the aim to provide a host of lifestyle services to its

users on their finger tips. Our focus and hostile nature is not only limited to

our customers but also our business partners.

We at Vaamos understand the importance that merchants hold in this

entire process right from vendor onboarding to customer order fulfillment.

Therefore we have developed Vaamoz business app which is a one stop

shop for merchants to manage their service, packages, deals, offers,

outlets, customer orders, etc. This helps the customer to decide among all,

what’s best for him/her.
name: Vaamoz Online Private Limited

idea: This startup aims to solve a problem of helping customers reduce their Home loan / personal loan EMIs by helping them end to end through it with better financing options. We want to explore seed funding for making a world class app & website & also start the digital marketing for the idea at large scale
name: Reduce your EMI

idea:
Welcome to the exotic world of design & stylish concepts of Athena Crafts. Our range of complete innovative solutions for kitchens from Basket pullouts, Cabinet and Shutters will leave you spellbound, while our trendy Wardrobes, Office Furniture & Retail ideas will amaze you.

With an ultra modern in-house production facility, we manufacture shutters & carcasses with over with almost 100 types of different shades & finishes to complement every home interior. Our state of the art manufacturing facility is equipped with all European machinery which enables quality processing like Routing, Drilling, Edge Banding, Cold Pressing laminates on the board among other things. Moreover, our philosophy of creating happy customers coupled with trained staff always ensures quality and service of the highest order.

So if you want to elevate your kitchen space to another level or enhance your lifestyle with exquisite Wardrobes, Beds, Office Furniture & Retail Showroom Furniture ideas, Athena Crafts is truly your ultimate Destination!!
name: Athena Crafts

idea: May4.com is an end to nd Customer experience management company which combines mystery shopping services with enterprise CX tech platform
